name: Gravity Bomber
description:
Conquer space itself in this addictive puzzle strategy game! Use the gravity of suns and planets to curve your bombs and destroy the opposing battleship - can you rack up the highest scores?

  • Quick play, tournaments, or survival - can you master gravity itself?
  • Land trick shots to maximise your score!
  • Play against the AI or against a friend on the same device!
  • 2,000 unique levels to conquer!
  • 3 difficulty settings - the higher the difficulty, the more points you earn!
  • Compare your highest scores against every other player with online leaderboards!
  • No ads, no extra paid content, no data collection - just a complete game experience that is perfect for quick bursts of play!
